meanings.definition: A person or thing that completes something.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was missing a piece, but the completer made it whole.
meanings.sent2: The completer added the final touches to the project.
meanings.sent3: The completer, a magical wand, finished the spell with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: She was the missing completer in his life, bringing everything together.
meanings.sent5: The completer, like the last puzzle piece, fit perfectly into the team.

meanings.definition: One who finishes a task or project.
meanings.sent1: The completer always ensures everything is done on time.
meanings.sent2: As the completer, she wrapped up the presentation smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The completer, a diligent worker, never leaves a task unfinished.
meanings.sent4: He was the completer of dreams, turning ideas into reality.
meanings.sent5: The completer, like a superhero, swooped in to save the day and finish the job.

meanings.definition: A final course or dish served at a meal.
meanings.sent1: The completer, a decadent dessert, was the highlight of the dinner.
meanings.sent2: After the main course, the completer was a delicious treat.
meanings.sent3: The completer, a sweet surprise, delighted everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: The completer, like a cherry on top, added the perfect ending to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The completer, a scrumptious cake, left everyone satisfied and happy.
